title: Give me a reading list of 20 articles up to 2022 about efficient and robust knowledge graph construction methods focusing on prompt learning and adversarial training
<|assistant|>
Here is a reading list of 20 articles up to 2022 that focus on efficient and robust knowledge graph construction methods using prompt learning and adversarial training
Prompt Engineering for Knowledge Graphs
- This paper introduces prompt engineering as a new approach to constructing knowledge graphs, which leverages the power of prompts to generate informative and diverse graph structures
Adversarial Training for Knowledge Graph Construction
- This paper proposes a novel adversarial training approach to construct knowledge graphs that can effectively handle schema matching and data augmentation tasks
GraphGen: Generating Knowledge Graphs with Graph Neural Networks
- This paper presents GraphGen, a generative model for knowledge graph construction that leverages graph neural networks to generate diverse and informative graph structures
Graph Attention Networks for Knowledge Graph Construction
- This paper proposes Graph Attention Networks (GATs) for knowledge graph construction, which can effectively capture the dependencies between entities and attributes in the graph
